ReturnPolicy.Description:
• We will only refund items that are returned in the state they were dispatched and any labels must be intact.

• Should a claim for non arrival of an order arise we will refund you once we have received compensation from the post office.

• Our returns policy complies with the UK’s Consumer Protection (distance selling) Regulations. Your Statutory Rights will not be affected.

• We offer a full refund option on all orders to the cost of the item(s) as long as the following conditions are met:

• Email us within 24 hours of receiving your item(s) stating what you are returning and why. We will then advise you of how to return your item(s).

• Then simply return the item(s) within 7 days. 

We regret that we are unable to refund return postage costs.
